5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Aişe (r.anha)'6an; şöyle demiştir: Nebi (Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem) geceleyin dokuz rek'at namaz kılardı

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ يُصَلِّي بِاللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning how many Rak’ah should be prayed at night
